kw.name: เปิดเบราว์เซอร์ใหม่
Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.arg: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
